document.full_text: women and children in the besieged syrian city of deraa chanted "god is greatest against the tyrant" from rooftops in the night after troops backed by tanks intensified a crackdown on the city, a resident said.
document.title: syrians protest from rooftops after army action
lines_and_colors: women and children in the besieged syrian city of deraa chanted "god is greatest against the tyrant" from rooftops in the night after troops backed by tanks intensified a crackdown on the city, a resident said.
